pricing.title: Simple credit pricing
pricing.subtitle: Credits are usage units consumed per task, not a form of currency.
pricing.disclaimer: z-image.ai uses open-source AI models (Apache-2.0) deployed and optimized on our own infrastructure. We are not affiliated with any model provider.

items.title: Starter Yearly
items.description: Kick off projects with a light, flexible credit pack.
features: 22680 flexible credits/year for all features on z-image.ai
≈11340 z-image gen (2 credits each)
≈2835 seconds LTX-2 video (8 credits per second)
≈Use All 25 Models listed on our site
Perfect for beginners exploring the core features of z-image.ai.
